resources.string: It\'s a simple option that doesn\'t have a whole lot of flair. That is extremely preferable
Got questions regarding the app?Issues or compliments reach out via ruitiarigibson@students.uonbi.ac.ke *_*
The app needs permission read your storage in order for the app to function. ^_^

Filio is a file manager app inspired by google files.The app is not in anyway affiliated with google.In addition, the app does not in any way sell or give your data to third parties.It is solely for educational purposes
